## 📊 VIP等级用户分析报告

sql:
SELECT 
    c.name as category_name,
    COUNT(DISTINCT oi.order_id) as order_count,
    SUM(oi.quantity) as total_quantity,
    SUM(oi.subtotal) as total_sales_amount,
    COUNT(DISTINCT p.id) as product_count
FROM categories c
LEFT JOIN products p ON c.id = p.category_id
LEFT JOIN order_items oi ON p.id = oi.product_id
LEFT JOIN orders o ON oi.order_id = o.id
WHERE o.status = 'completed' OR o.status IS NULL
GROUP BY c.id, c.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT oi.order_id) > 0
ORDER BY total_sales_amount DESC
LIMIT 10

sql:
WITH status_counts AS (
    SELECT 
        status,
        COUNT(*) as order_count
    FROM orders 
    GROUP BY status
),
status_sequence AS (
    SELECT 
        status,
        order_count,
        CASE status
            WHEN 'pending' THEN 1
            WHEN 'paid' THEN 2
            WHEN 'shipped' THEN 3
            WHEN 'completed' THEN 4
            WHEN 'cancelled' THEN 5
        END as sequence_order
    FROM status_counts
)
SELECT 
    status,
    order_count,
    sequence_order,
    ROUND(order_count * 100.0 / FIRST_VALUE(order_count) OVER (ORDER BY sequence_order), 2) as conversion_rate_from_start,
    ROUND(order_count * 100.0 / LAG(order_count, 1, order_count) OVER (ORDER BY sequence_order), 2) as conversion_rate_from_previous
FROM status_sequence
ORDER BY sequence_order;

SELECT 
    p.name,
    p.brand,
    p.rating,
    p.sales_count,
    p.price,
    c.name as category_name,
    CASE 
        WHEN p.rating::numeric >= 4.8 AND p.sales_count::numeric >= 500 THEN '明星产品'
        WHEN p.rating::numeric >= 4.8 AND p.sales_count::numeric < 500 THEN '高评分低销量'
        WHEN p.rating::numeric < 4.8 AND p.sales_count::numeric >= 500 THEN '低评分高销量'
        ELSE '普通产品'
    END as product_type
FROM products p
LEFT JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.id
WHERE p.rating IS NOT NULL AND p.sales_count IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY p.rating::numeric DESC, p.sales_count::numeric DESC

SELECT 
    p.brand as 品牌,
    COUNT(DISTINCT oi.order_id) as 订单数量,
    SUM(oi.quantity) as 总销量,
    SUM(oi.subtotal) as 销售额,
    ROUND(SUM(oi.subtotal) * 100.0 / SUM(SUM(oi.subtotal)) OVER(), 2) as 市场份额百分比
FROM products p
JOIN order_items oi ON p.id = oi.product_id
JOIN orders o ON oi.order_id = o.id
WHERE p.brand IS NOT NULL AND p.brand != ''
GROUP BY p.brand
ORDER BY 销售额 DESC
